short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Speeds up YouTube ads up to 16x.
short.es: Acelera los anuncios de YouTube hasta 16 veces.
short.fr: Accélère les publicités YouTube jusqu'à 16 fois.
short.hi: YouTube विज्ञापनों की गति को 16 गुना तक बढ़ाएं।
short.it: Aumenta la velocità degli annunci su YouTube fino a 16 volte.
short.ja: YouTubeの広告を最大16倍速で再生します。
short.pt_BR: Acelera os anúncios do YouTube em até 16 vezes.
short.ru: Ускоряет рекламу на YouTube до 16 раз.

long.ar,de,es,fr,hi,it,ja,ko,pt_BR,ru,zh_CN: This extension can make youtube ads 16 times faster and mutes them, it provides the option to click the skip button automatically to enhance viewing pleasure. Ideal for minimizing interruptions from ads on YouTube.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Enhance your YouTube viewing experience with this extension that allows you to speed up ads by 16x and completely mutes them. Enjoy the convenience of automatically skipping ads to reduce interruptions, making your YouTube viewing experience smoother and more enjoyable. Ideal for users who want to avoid ad interruptions while still enjoying YouTube content.
